name: Ocean Commotion (barsk)
description:
[SK Games]

Originally played with 5 foot pedals on each side of a flat-laid screen, the pedals were mapped to the top row of keys (QWERTYUIOP), and X is the start button for some reason.

Beat your opponent in whacking the sharks, but don't hit the sea mines or you'll lose a tentacle. 

SK Games were sof loui kai blake meg chris
